title: Ep. 104 - Saving Sex For Marriage Solves Lots of Problems
description:
Abstinence before marriage is not just a religious idea. It is a strategy that could solve or greatly reduce many of our most serious societal problems. Advocating “safe sex” has not solved anything. Maybe it’s time to rethink some things.
